head.supplied: South Australia ¶ Crown Lands & Immign. Office ¶ Adelaide.- 9. Sept. 1862. ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to acknowledge receipt of your letter of the 12th Apl. last (881/62) requesting to be furnished ...

div.p: Sammlung Perthes Archiv, SPA ARCH PGM 328 , Forschungsbibliothek Gotha der Universität Erfurt.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: MS annotation by Petermann: 'Erh. 22.11.1862. | A. 16.5.1863'. [Received 22 November 1862. Answered 16 May 1863.] See A. Petermann to M, 16 May 1863. South Australia

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: I have the honor to acknowledge receipt of your letter of the 12th Apl. last (881/62) requesting to be furnished with certain plans for transmission to the Director of the Geographical Institute of Gotha. The Commr. regrets that the press of business in the Office has prevented your wishes being complied with before this but he has now much pleasure in forwarding to you copies of such of the Maps published under the authority of this Govt. as appear to be suitable for the purposes indicated.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: P.S. The Maps are sent by this Mail.
